website_summaries.verdict: A premium, near bezel-less option with a large screen ideal for watching videos and playing games.
pros: Large, wide screen offers good color reproduction for applications like graphic design and computer-generated imagery software
Supports a Display Port connection for fast video input
cons: Built-in buttons are difficult to press when navigating through the monitor menu screens

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The manufacturer still hasn't replaced it and the bleeding has gotten worse. I purchased two of these monitors less than a month ago and one of them has already crapped out.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Walz

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitors, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up once I figured out how to remove the back to get take the stand completely off. Just a tip, use a credit card to pop off the plastic, works like a charm. One of the screws for the VESA bracket wasn't threaded properly, I emailed customer support, and within 5hrs I had a response, and the screws were mailed to me within 2 business days. Could not be happier with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, sleek body, super slim bezel, VESA mounts so you can wall mount and HDMI.  Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: I literally shopped for about 6 months for a monitor before buying this and I couldn't be happier. While not a Samsung, Asus or HP which we've all heard of, this thing beat them all and for about half the cost. My requirements were a 27" monitor with virtually no bezel and it had to be visually appealing as I wanted to hang it in our family room for a CCTV system and $200 was all I was looking to pay. This was it. Its thin, has VESA mounts, super thin bezel, very crisp, clear picture and best of all its the price of most 23 inch screens.
customer_reviews.author: iluvdabeer

customer_reviews.title: A great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor with very clear colors. I use this for touching up photos for work and I use it for gaming. This is a good value for the money! The only issue that i had was when I was trying to figure out how to remove the stand arm from the back of the monitor. I downloaded the PDF manual, but there were no instructions for this. You have to pop out the long silver panel on the back and then unscrew the four black screws that hold the arm on the monitor. Once the arm is removed, you can mount this on the wall or an adjustable arm.
customer_reviews.author: colordigits

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: For a speaker-less monitor, it's basic functioning is fine. Of course, it has speakers, but you won't want to use them. They're terrible. Of course, that's when it functions. I bought two of these. One was terrible... it would just flicker out and require powering off and back on. I replaced it with an HP monitor. Now the second one is flickering and sometimes goes to a static-like screen, like the old CRT tvs connected by antenna. Stay away from AOC monitors.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA C LETTERMAN

customer_reviews.title: AOC i2777fq 27-Inch Class IPS LED Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Thin bezel -Gaming was acceptable -No noticeable ghosting -Light bleed is minimal and uniform -colors are great -This model has VESA mounts. Cons: -Power cable is proprietary cable with power brick. -1080p on 27" means low pixel density Overall I am happy with these and feel they are an excellent value. I was considering purchasing a third but I think I will go with a 1440p monitor for the primary display.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. It is really large and looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. It is really large and looks fantastic. It definitely feels like a premium monitor too. I got the i2777fq version. I wish it had a DVI input, but it does not. The image quality is great and with some color adjustment, it looks fantastic. I was able to OC to 75hz. I originally bought an ASUS that had dead pixels and I returned it and got this instead. The ASUS had some blurry images from being 27in and 1080p, but this one is able to pull it off just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stream Netflix, not for gaming. The price is right, the color is beautiful. I don't need to turn the brightness all the way down, though the "warm" setting is still not warm enough for my liking (to cut down on blue light). But it is an IPS display. Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. Fok

customer_reviews.title: I love both of new monitors
customer_reviews.text: I love both of new monitors. I use one in portrait and one in landscape orientation. The bezel is so thin especially compared to my older AOC color is amazing. Instructions were terrible and the large silver plastic strip on the back needs removed to take off the stand but it wasn't difficult just poorly documented but the image is amazing. Calibrated well enough to use professionally. Would buy again and have even considered 2 more for my office because having these at home is spoiling me
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Appealing price, lackluster color
customer_reviews.text: As a few others have indicated, color representation is pretty rough on this model (AOC i2777fq). Even in sRGB mode, colors are washed out, yellow, terrible blacks and overall lacking detail. I make this comparison against a 100% sRGB certified monitor intended for graphic design.
customer_reviews.author: Travis F.

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY SO FAST
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasure, I was dreading the installation. Piece of cake, so upset that I didn't give myself a bigger easier viewing screen a LONG time ago. Comes with a 3 year warranty, and even tho there were instructions in every language but English, it was totally easy. Highly recommend....so far anyway, just day one.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Que

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, with the fatal flaw that the brightness does not adjust nearly low enough
customer_reviews.text: "0" brightness on this monitor makes me want to gouge my eyes out when the lights are off. It is totally unacceptable for a home setting. Was fine when I used it in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor. 27inch frameless.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the monitor, although it is mountable the stand doesn't completely come off. On top of that you need a specific wall mount for this monitor due to the stand not being completely removable. It seems unfortunate, the only reason I decided to return it was because I did not want to spend another $30-$40 on another wall mount. If you're not going to mount the monitor, I definitely recommend it as it makes your whole table and set up look very sleek and slim; it also attracts a lot of attention.
customer_reviews.author: Fisnik Guri

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitors, with thin bezels
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitors, with thin bezels. Good value, only wishes there was a remote. I switch back and forth from DisplayPort and HDMI connections. I don't like where they put the setting buttons. It's great if you don't adjust your settings or switch between inputs. But, I regularly need to switch inputs. The switches are behind the bottom on the lower right corner. You have to pinch the monitor to press the switches. That being said, I have no reservations about purchasing this monitor again or recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Espocito

customer_reviews.title: Simply put a beautiful IPS, state of the art looking Great for ...
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Simply put a beautiful IPS, state of the art looking Great for gaming 5ms response time 1080p gaming winner in my book!! CONS: You will have to adjust the color temp out of the box it seemed like alot of background noise, to white or something out of the box easy to fix. Could be just me though Was looking at the Asus monitor with 2,000 great reviews but glad I went with this instead
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture once you change the default settings to be a bit more natural. Great product for the price and seems to be decent build. The buttons seems to be a bit more complicated than needed but over all a great buy. I would recommend to anyone looking for a cheap but nice monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Collier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen for multimonitor setup
customer_reviews.text: They're attractive, minimalist designs, good image quality, and have integrated VESA mounts. You pull off the silver bezel on the back to remove the stand, btw. If you're looking for a minimal bezel monitor for multi setup, look no further. I have three of these in a surround configuration and am very pleased, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey W. Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Really nice IPS monitor for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice monitor, IPS glow can be a bit annoying if you're not positioned precisely in the right spot. Out of the box, it looked really good and after going through the Windows 10 display calibration, it looks even better! My only real complaint is that the stand is ever so slightly leaning to one side and doesn't allow height adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to upgrade his center monitor, he seems to like it a lot. I haven't heard any complaints! The picture quality is really nice and he uses it mainly for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, vivid, and high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these monitors for close to a year now and they are great. They have very vivid colors and the response time is great, even for gaming. I personally never used the stand as I mounted them. They are pretty hefty from a weight standpoint but they are huge monitors. My mounting arms have no trouble keeping them up. The bevel-less border is great too, overall they look very sleek. I haven't had anything to quibble about so far! I hope to have them for many more years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Quality picture
customer_reviews.text: Overall, AOC produces budget friendly monitors that look great + sleek. I can't stand the round hunky plastic bases found on many of the ASUS or ACER monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The screen size is perfect for my multitasking
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my home office. The screen size is perfect for my multitasking. The built in speakers aren't great but I was expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: Cheezer

customer_reviews.title: The definition is really good, the only complaint I have is with the ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this monitor surprised me. The definition is really good, the only complaint I have is with the color of the monitor but considering the price it's fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: ... and with their ultra-thin bezel they make for a great looking quad-screen video wall on his new computer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these for a client of mine and with their ultra-thin bezel they make for a great looking quad-screen video wall on his new computer. I'm quite impressed and will be ordering more of these in the future.

customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these one for my wife and one for myself. They have a very thin bezel and they look fantastic. If your looking at this monitor buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and one of them was making popping noises and going on and off right from the start. I came back to read all reviews and saw a lot of similar complaints. I was afraid that the problem could arise again in the future on the other monitor so I decided to return both. Huge hassle. It's a good looking monitor, though, and the image was beautiful. It's a shame the quality control is bad. Better stay away from this.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Reis

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with this monitor. The reviews all spoke highly of it but after about a week, I wish I would have purchased something else. What I like: The size is great, the styling is great, the HDMI is great. What I don't like: The pixels are grainy, the speakers are almost worthless, and the adjustments lack a lot of control.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cervas

customer_reviews.title: It's a great monitor, gives everything it announces
customer_reviews.text: It's a great monitor, gives everything it announces.I gave 4 stars because I've been using it for about a week and I noticed that It has 3 hot pixels. It's too bothersome for me to send it back (it was an international shipping), if it wasn't for this it would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Porras Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are awful; waking takes too long.
customer_reviews.text: PROs: It's a decent monitor. CONs: The speakers are absolute garbage. You will never be able to use the in-monitor speakers for anything. If you need a monitor with speakers, this isn't the monitor for you. When the monitor is sleeping it can take almost 30 seconds to wake up which is just annoying enough that I wouldn't buy this monitor again.
